field.label: Products SKU
field.comment: List, one per row, the skus of the products to be added in cart blocks. It will work only with products that have been added to the Multiple cross-sell products field - Please use only SIMPLE PRODUCTS

field.label: All or nothing Products SKU
field.comment: List, one per row, the skus of the products to be added in cart blocks. It will work only with products that have been added to the Multiple cross-sell products field in ALL valid products (not in the above field, not in this field, not free) in the cart - Please use only SIMPLE PRODUCTS

field.label: Free only additional Products SKU
field.comment: List, one per row, the skus of the products to be added in cart blocks. They will be added ONLY if ALL the products in the cart are FREE SAMPLES - Please use only SIMPLE PRODUCTS
